org.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.project_id NOT IN (SELECT projects.id FROM projects WHERE projects.lft >= NULL AND projects.lft < NULL ORDER BY projects.name ASC) AND work_packages.version_id IN (SELECT versions.id FROM versions LEFT OUTER JOIN projects ON projects.id = versions.project_id WHERE projects.active = "$1" AND projects.id IN (SELECT projects.id FROM projects WHERE projects.lft >= NULL AND projects.lft < NULL ORDER BY projects.name ASC)) LIMIT 1

rewrites.sql: SELECT 1 AS one FROM work_packages WHERE work_packages.project_id NOT IN (SELECT projects.id FROM projects WHERE projects.lft >= NULL AND projects.lft < NULL ORDER BY projects.name ASC) AND work_packages.version_id IN (SELECT versions.id FROM versions INNER JOIN projects ON projects.id = versions.project_id WHERE projects.active = "$1" AND projects.id IN (SELECT projects.id FROM projects WHERE projects.lft >= NULL AND projects.lft < NULL ORDER BY projects.name ASC)) LIMIT 1
